fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Heartstopper Strike
**2)** Normal Attack:  Fudou Style Martial Arts
**3)** Elemental Burst: Windmuster Kick

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
4 Viridescent Venerer is the best artifact set by far for Heizou. In teams that already have an anemo running the 4-piece effect, running 2p combination sets on heizou is an option. 

When playing Heizou in Electrocharge team compositions as an on-field driver, 4VV + Elemental Mastery mainstats and substats can be preferred for its consistent multi-target damage; opting to focus on his swirls and electrocharge ownership to make up the bulk of his personal damage instead of his talent multipliers.
